content: make a statement of style with these floral crochet earrings stitched in aunt lydia s classic crochet thread they are fresh and versatile to wear with any casual outfit make them in black and they re perfect with evening wear pattern is simple too featuring chain double_crochet and slip_stitch techniques create a pair in a selection of shades to match all your summertime looks materials two 7mm jump rings two fish hook ear wires
